mkv63:2: katame daśānuśaṁsās tathāgatacaityavandanāyām. ucyate. abhirūpo bhavati. susvaraḥ. ādeyavākyaḥ. pariṣadam upasaṁkrāntaḥ pariṣadam āvarjayati priyo bhavati devamanuṣyāṇām. maheśākhyo bhavati. maheśākhyaiḥ samāgamo sattvaiḥ bhavati. buddhair buddhaśrāvakaiś ca samāgamo bhavati. mahābhogo bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṁ ca parinirvāti. ime daśānuśāṁsās tathāgatacaityavandanāyāḥ.
